name: HACK*MATCH
overview:
Think you've got what it takes? Enter the Cyber Arena and put your action puzzle skills to the test in HACK*MATCH! You'll need speed, dexterity, and plenty of smarts to get the highest score. Any move could be the difference between ultimate hacker glory - or humiliating defeat!

- Match four or more Data Files of the same color to make them disappear. Make multiple matches in a row for huge combo bonuses!

- Match two Logic Bombs of the same color to make all files of that color disappear. Now that's a hack!

- Challenge an opponent to a hacker showdown. Send them Garbage Files to slow them down and claim victory!

See you inn the Cyber Arena, super hacker!
